name: Document
responsibilities: Represents the main model of the data of this software

name: Document Manager
responsibilities: Handles creation of new objects of type Document
Handles template creation

name: VersionsManager
responsibilities: Controls the versioning system.
Enables/disables the versioning system
Sets the mode / strategy of operation (Volatile/Stable)

name: VersionsStrategy
responsibilities: Puts new version of document in the versioning system
gets previous version of document
sets entire history of documents
returns entire history of documents
removes latest version from the versioning system

name: VolatileVersionsStrategy
responsibilities: Stores document versions in Memory (ArrayList)
Returns most recent version stored.
Returns entire history of document versions (ArrayList)
Can "be fed"  entire document history in form of ArrayList

name: StableVersionsStrategy
responsibilities: Saves the document versions on the filesystem in .tex format
Saves new versions of Document
Returns previous version of Document
Can "be fed" entire Document version history to be saved on the filesystem
Returns entire document history from filesystem

name: VersionsStrategyFactory
responsibilities: Creates objects of VolatileVersionStrategy or StableVersionStrategy based on Input

name: LatexEditorController
responsibilities: Enacts commands according to input from the GUI.
Creates manager objects for the different systems (versioning and encryption).
Keeps the current Document.

name: Command
responsibilities: executes command

name: CommandFactory
responsibilities: Creates instances of command classes that extend the SuperCommand class and implement the command interface.
With the help of LatexEditorController, each command class gets an instance of the manager they need.

name: SuperCommand
responsibilities: a super class that holds the common fields of command classes.
implements the Command Interface

name: EnableVersionsManager
responsibilities: Enables Versioning system

name: DisableVersionsManager
responsibilities: Disables Versioning System

name: AddLatexCommand
responsibilities: Adds the selected latex command at the caret position inside the Document.
Keeps a copy of the document in the versioning system.

name: CreateCommand
responsibilities: Gets Document manager to create a new document based on input (type)
Sets document created as current in LatexEditorController.
Keeps a copy of the new document in the versioning system.

name: EditCommand
responsibilities: Keeps text area and the document in backend updated.
Adds a copy of the document in the versioning system.

name: ChangeVersionsCommand
responsibilities: Changes the Strategy of the versioning system

name: LoadCommand
responsibilities: Loads a file in the system as a new document.

name: SaveCommand
responsibilities: Saves the document as a file in the hard disk.

name: RollbacktoPreviousVersionCommand
responsibilities: Rolls back to previous version of the document

name: ChangeCipherStrategyCommand
responsibilities: Changes the Strategy of the encrypting system

name: SaveEncryptedCommand
responsibilities: Saves the document as an encrypted file in the hard disk.

name: LoadEncryptedCommand
responsibilities: Loads an encrypted file in the system as a new document.

name: CipherManager
responsibilities: Controls the encryption system.
Sets the algorithm for encryption (Atbash/Rot13)

name: CipherStrategy
responsibilities: encrypts a String
decrypts a String

name: Rot13Cipher
responsibilities: Encrypts a String based on Rot13 algorithm.
Decrypts a String based on Rot13 algorithm.

name: AtbashCipher
responsibilities: Encrypts a String based on Atbash algorithm.
Decrypts a String based on Atbash algorithm.

name: CipherFactory
responsibilities: Creates instances of cipher classes that implement the CipherStrategy interface.

name: FileLoader
responsibilities: Loads a file from the disk as a String

name: FileSaver
responsibilities: Saves a file in the disk

name: OpeningWindow
responsibilities: Has the 'main' function.
Creates the LatexEditorController.
Shows the starting window.

name: ChooseTemplate
responsibilities: Shows a window where the user can choose the type of document he wants to write.

name: MainWindow
responsibilities: Shows the main window and work environment for the user.
Handles all user actions with the help of action listeners.
For each action the user chooses to do, calls the LatexEditorController to work on it on the backend.
